```{r}
library(StereoMorph)
library(Momocs)
library(ggplot2)
library(geomorph)
library(readr)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
files<-paste0("Mox_images/shapes/TU198404_",1:6,"_L.txt")

(a<-readShapes(files))
```
```{r}
lm<-a$landmarks.scaled
lm
```

```{r}
curv<-a$curves.scaled
```


```{r}
lm1<-lm[,,1]
lm1<-rbind(lm1,pointsAtEvenSpacing(curv$TU198404_1_L$body_post,n=10),
               pointsAtEvenSpacing(curv$TU198404_1_L$body_ant,n=20),
               pointsAtEvenSpacing(curv$TU198404_1_L$opercle,n=10))
```

```{r}
ggplot(as.data.frame(lm1),aes(V1,V2))+
  geom_point()
```
```{r}
gpa<-gpagen(a$landmarks.scaled)
gpa
```
```{r}
plotAllSpecimens(gpa$coords,mean=F)
```
